text:
A medical college student was stabbed by a group of persons in a cinema theatre here.

Gokul Chandran (22) of Mayiladuthurai is a second year student in the Government Tiruvannamalai Medical College. He had gone to Sakthi Theatre along with his friends on Friday night. At the vehicle stand, a quarrel broke out between him and another group of men. They attacked Gokul Chandran and one of them suddenly stabbed him . Police arrested Gopi of Ramji Nagar and Veerangan of Samuthiram village. – Staff Reporter
title: Medical college student stabbed
